I don’t suppose (that).translation[0].de: used to ask a question in an indirect way, especially if you think the answer will be ‘no’
I don’t suppose you have any idea where my address book is, do you?
used to ask for something in a very polite way
I don’t suppose you’d give me a lift to the station?
used to say that you think it is unlikely something will happen
I don’t suppose I’ll ever see her again.
